A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Deplorable and egregious continuation to the force awakens. It is clear that a multiple director/writer approach has debilitated this saga. Many of the plot points I was looking forward to being explored were abandoned\, and substituted with random sub-plots that add no substance to the lore\, or explore the characters in a meaningful way. They simply existed\, I would say 45 minutes of this film could have been cut out and it would have been inconsequential to the main story line. This is a shame\, considering that there is never a scene where Luke and Ray are training\, there are no light saber fights\, and the essence of star wars is simply missing. I walked away feeling like I had just watched another side movie like Rogue One. Not sure how they plan on expanding this trilogy\, but  I am considerably less enthused to watch the final film after this.
